about_description_1: At Chinor Group, we are dedicated to making our clients' dreams come true. We are known as a reliable partner in the real estate market, providing our clients with the best services and putting their needs first.
about_description_2: Our team consists of highly qualified specialists who carefully manage each project and provide an individual approach to our clients. Our goal is to earn your trust and provide you with the best service.
choose_us_reason_1_desc: Chinor Group houses stand out with modern architecture and the use of high-quality materials. Attention is paid to every detail, ensuring you a comfortable and durable home.
choose_us_reason_2_desc: Our company has more than 10 years of experience and has implemented many successful projects. We understand our clients' needs and help bring their dreams to life.
choose_us_reason_3_desc: Chinor Group strives to build long-term relationships with clients. Our goal is to earn your trust and provide you with the best service.

reviews_description: Read the feedback and experiences of our clients who have worked with Chinor Group. Their words reflect our quality services and dedication to customers.
reviews_1_description: I personally monitored the construction process and was convinced that the houses are built with quality. Currently, the apartments are cozy and warm, and there are playgrounds for children.
reviews_2_description: Before buying a house, we thoroughly checked everything, the safety of our children and that strangers would not disturb us was very important to us. Moreover, many construction companies' documents turned out to be not in order. Chinor Group has all documents in order and transparent.
reviews_3_description: They helped me purchase an apartment on convenient terms, and gave a very large discount for 100% payment
company_description_1: Chinor Group Development is a modern construction company that has confidently established itself in the Tashkent real estate market. The main area of activity is the construction of residential complexes with an emphasis on construction quality, thoughtful architecture and a favorable urban environment. One of the developer's key projects is Jomiy Residence, located in a promising area of the city. The complex includes 14 and 16-story buildings with apartments of various sizes, built using monolithic frame technology.
company_description_2: Spacious rooms, high ceilings, energy-efficient materials and developed infrastructure make this project attractive for both investors and families. The company offers flexible purchase terms: installment plans and mortgages, as well as timely delivery of facilities. Chinor Group Development strives to create comfortable and safe housing for those who value practicality and reliability.
